signal.title: The Antenna
signal.content: Turning jagged noise into flowing light. Voiceover: 'The pain isn't a malfunction. It is Data. Tune it up.'

academy.title: Physics of the Plug-In
academy.content: You download files when you make eye contact. You must learn to read the file without saving it to your hard drive.

guild.title: The Screen Wipe
guild.objective: Clear foreign data from your system.
steps: Visual: White light bar scanning down.
Action: Push the data into the earth.

nexus.title: Book #4: The Server
nexus.quote: If you feel everything, it's because you were built to handle the bandwidth. You are the immune system of humanity.
